core:processNote.core:description:
WARNING Region broadcasts are collated at location level. This means that the notification must be sent to the location queue. If it was sent to the region queue, then each device in the region will process all of the location specific updates and not just that for its location.
See PLAT-5482

core:action.core:comment: Note: The filter ID is modified in the listAll() method to reflect the group level to match.
